text: The 2014 African Women's Handball Champions League was the 36th edition, organized by the African Handball Confederation, under the auspices of the International Handball Federation, the handball sport governing body. The tournament was held from October 9–18, 2014 in four venues: Salle Beni Khiar, Salle Hammamet, Salle Nabeul and Salle Zouaoui, in Tunis, Tunisia, contested by 10 teams and won by Clube Desportivo Primeiro de Agosto of Angola. ==Draw== {| class="wikitable" !width=195px|Group A !width=195px|Group B |- |valign=top| Africa Sports National FAP Youndé Mikishi Lubumbashi Nuru Katanga Petro de Luanda |valign=top| Étoile du Congo Nairobi Water Phoenix Gabon Progresso do Sambizanga Primeiro de Agosto |} ==Preliminary rounds== :Times given below are in CET UTC+1. ===Group A=== {| style="text-align:center" width=550 |- !
